Module rrpss
Package menu

Class PromotionPackageMgr

java.lang.Object
menu.PromotionPackageMgr
public class PromotionPackageMgr extends Object
The control class for promotion packages This control class will manage the list of promotion packages
Author:
yes

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PromotionPackageMgr()
    When instantiating this control, it will create a list of promotion packages, as well as instantiate a promotionPackageUI for UI displays

  • Constructor Details

    • PromotionPackageMgr

      public PromotionPackageMgr()
      When instantiating this control, it will create a list of promotion packages, as well as instantiate a promotionPackageUI for UI displays

  • Method Details

    • edit

      public void edit​(ArrayList<MenuItem> listOfMenuItems)
      Edits the promotion package based on the user's choices accordingly
      Parameters:
      listOfMenuItems - The list of menu items, should they be added to a package

    • getListOfPromotion

      public static ArrayList<PromotionPackage> getListOfPromotion()
      Gets the list of promotion packages
      Returns:
      The list of promotion packages

    • getItemPromotionPackage

      public static PromotionPackage getItemPromotionPackage​(int packageId)
      Gets the promotion package object from the package ID
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID from which we want to get the promotion package object
      Returns:
      The promotion package object corresponding to the package ID entered

    • getAvailablePromotionId

      public static int getAvailablePromotionId()
      Gets an empty ID slot from the promotion package list
      Returns:
      An ID slot that is empty and available from the the promotion package list

    • viewPackages

      public void viewPackages()
      Displays the existing promotion packages

    • addNewPromotion

      public void addNewPromotion​(int packageId, String packageName, String packageDescription, double packagePrice, ArrayList<MenuItem> listOfMenuItem)
      Adds a new promotion package to the list
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the promotion package to add
      packageName - The name of the promotion package to add
      packageDescription - The description of the promotion package to add
      packagePrice - The price of the promotion package to add
      listOfMenuItem - The contents, in menuItems, of the promotion package

    • removePromotion

      public void removePromotion​(int packageId)
      Removes a promotion package from the list
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the promotion package to be removed

    • updatePackageName

      public void updatePackageName​(int packageId, String newName)
      Updates the name of a promotion package
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the promotion package to edit. If the ID cannot be found, the user will be notified
      newName - The new name of the promotion package to be changed to. If the name is invalid, the user will be notified

    • updatePackageDescription

      public void updatePackageDescription​(int packageId, String newDesc)
      Updates the description of the package
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the package whose description shall be updated. If the ID does not exist, the user will be notified
      newDesc - The new description to set

    • updatePackagePrice

      public void updatePackagePrice​(int packageId, double newPrice)
      Updates the price of the package
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the package whose price shall be updated. If the ID does not exist, the user will be notified
      newPrice - The new price to set. This value cannot be less than or equal to 0

    • addItemToPackage

      public void addItemToPackage​(int packageId, int itemId, ArrayList<MenuItem> listOfMenuItems)
      Adds an item to an existing package
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the package we want to add an item to. The user will be notified if the ID does not exist
      itemId - The ID of the item to add to the package. If the item does not exist, the user will be notified
      listOfMenuItems - The full list of menu items

    • removeItemFromPackage

      public void removeItemFromPackage​(int packageId, int itemId)
      Removes an item from a package
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the package from which we will remove an item from
      itemId - The ID of the item to be removed from the package

    • viewItemsInPackage

      public void viewItemsInPackage​(int packageId)
      Prints the item contents of a package
      Parameters:
      packageId - The ID of the package we want to view

    • load

      public void load()
      Loads the list of promotion packages from a .txt file

    • save

      public void save()
      Saves the list of promotions to the "promotionpackages.txt" file
